definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: No Corynebacterium diphtheriae was isolated from the nasopharyngeal swabs, neither of the patient nor of the close contacts.
sentences.chinese: 患者及其密切接触者咽拭子均未分离到白喉棒状杆菌。

sentences.english: The result of the urinary sediment culture was the same as that of the urinary swab culture.
sentences.chinese: 结果显示尿沉渣培养与拭子培养完全一致。

sentences.english: Each of the swab samples was subsequently assessed using a standard semiquantitative technique.
sentences.chinese: 随后采用半定量技术对每一份拭子样品进行评估。

sentences.english: Do not insert swab into ear canal.
The technician's console was also swabbed as a positive control.
sentences.chinese: 技师操作的悬臂同样进行拭子取样作为阳性对照组。

sentences.english: The results of both culture and serology are most informative for diagnosis of B. pertussis.
sentences.chinese: 鼻咽拭子特殊培养与血清学检查相结合有助于诊断。

sentences.english: The surgical cases from which the culture swabs were obtained are outlined in Table 1.
sentences.chinese: 使用培养拭子取样的手术病例的类别列举在表1。

definition: gonococcus/Neisseria gonorrhoeae, the pathogen causing gonorrhea
Gram negative (bacteria that do not retain Gram stain, often the more dangerous kind)
